item.description:
I want to go back to high school! The movie Jennifer’s Body will hit theaters on September 18, 2009. :) <xobject width="425" height="344"><xembed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/XJULbZ0ipoo&hl=en&fs=1&" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="344" style="margin : 5px ; max-width : 700px ; max-height : 700px"></xembed></xobject>
FYI, Megan Fox will star in the next Tomb Raider film
item.name: Jennifer’s Body
